Float Trip

Share on Facebook Tweet

Dates: September 1, 2013 through September 2, 2013

Location: New Braunfels, TX 78130 (Show me a map)

Come float the Comal River with us! We'll leave 2:00pm Sunday, September 1 to drive down and eat dinner in Gruene, TX at the famous Gristmill restaurant. We'll stay at Christ Presbyterian Church in New Braunfels and eat breakfast at the church Monday morning. Labor Day is float day, and we'll float for a few hours and leave New Braunfels by lunchtime on Monday. TCU RUF will join us as well. 

The cost is $40.00 which covers our accomodations at the church, breakfast, and float costs. We will also distribute gas money to all the drivers as well. Use the PayPal account below to register!
